mapper.select: SELECT user.userno, user.username, user.profileurl, commentinfo.regno, commentinfo.reply, commentinfo.reply_date FROM user,( SELECT commentreg.regno, commentreg.userno, comment.reply, comment.reply_date FROM comment , (SELECT * FROM commentreg WHERE postno = #{postno} ) AS commentreg WHERE comment.commentno = commentreg.regno ) AS commentinfo WHERE user.userno = commentinfo.userno;
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO comment(commentno, reply, reply_date) VALUES(#{commentno}, #{reply} , now())
mapper.update: UPDATE comment SET reply = #{reply}, reply_date = now() WHERE commentno = #{commentno}
